instructions: In Find My iPhone on iCloud.com, tap the device you want to erase in the Devices list. Erase the device . Because the device isn t lost, don t enter a phone number or message. If the device is offline, the remote erase begins the next time it s online. You receive an email when the device is erased. When the device is erased, tap Remove from Account. All your content is erased, and someone else can now activate the device.
